name: A BEEzarre Day
description:
[Warnings: Lots of colors which change rapidly, and the browser version takes a while to load]

Controls: Use the arrow keys to move left, right, up, or down

Made for the b3agz game jam. Theme: Swarm.

Made by NeoPlayzGames / NPG  (npg.itch.io) and TheShyDragon (https://theshydragon.itch.io/theshydragon.carrd.co)

We're still new to making games :D
